response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe holds significant value for those looking for excellence in its category. Considering its quality and the benefits it provides, I propose a price of $200 for this item. This price reflects not only the cost of production but also the unique features and benefits that set it apart in the market. I look forward to hearing your response and hope we can reach an agreement that benefits both of us.", "product_price": 200}
